ingredients: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast meat - finely chopped
1/2 teaspoon salt and pepper to taste
title: Fillet Pancakes
instructions:
In a large bowl, combine chicken, onion, mayonnaise, egg, flour, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Scoop chicken mixture onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each cake. Brown on both sides, and serve hot.
